website_summaries.verdict: Remains in place for several hours. Lotion has a non-greasy formula that is popular with many people.
pros: Works against mosquitoes and several other insects
Time-release formula provides protection over a long stretch of time
Lotion-like repellent lasts longer than sprays

customer_reviews.title: the best product on the market
customer_reviews.text: Husband is special ops in the Military. This is the only bug repellent I trust to send with him. I used it for years in Cambodia, Thailand and Africa and was never bothered by any bugs, and he says the same. Seriously, the best product on the market.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Does the job without all the heavy smell and spray. Good for the environment
customer_reviews.text: My daughter recommended this after a trip to Uganda. Mosquitos love me but I hate all the heavy spray. The little "flying teeth" just never end in South Florida. This spreads nicely and doesn't feel heavy and smelly. It will last me all day from early in the morning until I'm sitting by the campfire at night. Even if I just sit out on the patio in the evening, I can rub my feet and ankles and so glad not to have all the cover up and jumping through hoops just to sit outside for a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Diverdi

customer_reviews.title: YAY! NO BITES!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to insect repellent! It goes on very smooth and easily. I took it with me to Thailand for 3 weeks and never had a bit while using it (I forgot to twice when first getting there and once to reapply it after a shower). I have sensitive skin and was worried this would case a reaction of hives or rash like many products/fabrics cause for my skin but there were none! The smell isn't bad, I guess for me it was what I was expecting, because a chemical and having DEET. So no surprises for me since I went in with that thinking while ordering it. Overall, 100% yes I would recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Channy

customer_reviews.title: the only thing that works
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. i will use nothing else to protect from mosquitos. i am allergic to the little bloodsuckers and have not found another repellent that works this well. sprays tends to miss spots and be sticky. this applies like a normal moisturizer and allows for full coverage and absorption. Be sure to wash your hands after applying so you don't accidentally touch your eyes or mouth.
customer_reviews.author: TrixieBeaver

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of how much you use and for how long!
customer_reviews.text: This worked, but I had a very serious allergic reaction to this lotion after using it for several days. I developed an itchy rash that started in all areas that I used this product and spread to most of my body. I used Calendula Cream and it cleared up, but still very scary to develop a rash like this while on a trip to Bali.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great and provides full protection. I used it throughout my travels in the Caribbean and never got bit when I used it. The one time I forgot to put it on, I got bit multiple times. I do like how compact the product is as it easily fits into any purse or small bag. Contrary to the product label, this product is NOT odorless. It doesn't smell as strong as products like Off, but it definitely leaves an odor on your skin and on your clothes. It's also very greasy. Despite these drawbacks, I highly recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Keeping it Real

customer_reviews.title: Forget all the myths about repelling bugs.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing works like deet. Put another way, only deet keeps the bugs from biting. Everything else is just superstition and marketing. Consult the CDC website for the scientific facts. I don't like the sprays because a lot of it winds up on other things other than you and the aerosols stain plastics, like the bezel on my chart plotter and the vinyl siding on my front porch. This lotion just goes where you put it. If you value your health, you want something that works. This works!
customer_reviews.author: Nova Scotia

customer_reviews.title: Sawyer SP533 - great product for the great outdoors/camping - ASM 349-QN
customer_reviews.text: The Sawyer Premium Insect Repellent SP533 is the best formula for skin bar none!! Even Consumer Report (August 2018) ranked it very high on the best insect repellents available out there!! The product has worked very well on every camping trip with the Boy Scouts of Troop 349QN. Its effectiveness is as described - in my case - I rubbed it on skin and it lasted quite a few hours! Never saw any insects/mosquitos/ticks/gnats come close to our skin....Keeps those disease carrying insects away!! ASM 349QN
customer_reviews.author: Fabio66 FH

customer_reviews.title: Tested in rural Chiang Mai with elephants
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. Mosquitoes are particularly fond of me - more so than anyone I know. I always get ridiculous amounts of bites when I go anywhere outside. I bought this originally from where I got vaccinations before going to Thailand, and it turned out to be amazing. I went to rural Chiang Mai to an elephant rescue, and was in mud rivers and waterfalls in the jungle - it continued to work even after getting wet. I ended up purchasing more on here, and I'll continue to buy this. It's essentially odorless (very minimal smell), and it goes on like lotion (give it a minute to not be greasy, just like lotion).
customer_reviews.author: Dria

customer_reviews.title: Great protection, Melts plastic
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feelings. On the one hand, these kept the bugs off. WORTH IT. On the other hand, they leaked and melted several of my (plastic, specialty waterproof hiking) bags. Those were expensive and the lost liquid is also expensive. NOT WORTH IT. So, I recommend wrapping these in paper first (I used magazine pages) or fabric and then putting them in your bag. Taping them closed didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.author: cookie.dough

customer_reviews.title: It's the best DEET lotion there is. If you like DEET, that is
customer_reviews.text: Best DEET lotion on the market, even better than 3M Ultrathon. It's sort of a second-gen version of Ultrathon's slow-release lotion concept that 3M invented for the US military. Really great stuff, if you can deal with or prefer DEET. I'm not a DEET fan for various reasons, and I prefer Picaridin-based products compared to DEET (Sawyer's picaridin options are great BTW), but there are some situations where DEET is very handy, and this is the lotion to get, so I have a bottle just in case. 5 stars for the best DEET lotion you can buy. Otherwise, try the equivalent picaridin lotion by Sawyer.
customer_reviews.author: SF Scrutinizer

customer_reviews.title: Bye Bye Deer Flies!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have these "Evil" Flying Kamikaze things called Deer Flies. A smaller version of a Horsefly, but so much more aggressive than your mere Horsefly. They are relentless, and they just ping you...like they are just hitting you with their bodies, and then without notice they land and bite you like a Horsefly. I prayed that this stuff would work...and BOY DID IT!!! Wow...those Deer Flies do not like this stuff. They still hit you, but once they do...they are like....we don't want none of this, and they leave you alone. Glad I got this stuff, and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CharlestonCasual

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly non-greasy; effective protection
customer_reviews.text: We use this on our kids (ages 5 and 3 now, but we've been using it since the younger was about a year old). It's much easier and more pleasant than trying to spray them with something. This is also vastly superior to the 3M Ultrathon lotion of the same DEET concentration--it's much less greasy, but just as effective as far as I can tell. I have sometimes used it on myself, and it protects even mosquito magnet me.
customer_reviews.author: Cabell H. Gathman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for vacation
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a tropical vacation. It was perfect. I didn't get one mosquito bite while wearing it. It is carry on size. I prefer the lotion application to spray. It smells like bug spray as you are applying it, but the smell goes away pretty quickly. It feels non greasy soon after it is applied. My skin feels warm when I wear deet bugspray. Because of the slow release formula, I feel the deet heat whenever I sweat. I think sweating may cause more of the deet to be released.
customer_reviews.author: Heathermap

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!!
customer_reviews.text: We have used many mosquito repellants over the years, because we love to go camping but my husband and my daughter both get big welts from mosquito bites. This is by far the best stuff! It goes on smoothly, does not leave a strong smell or oily feeling residue, and it really works and keeps working. Yes, it will rinse off if you wipe away a lot of sweat or go wading, but that also means you can 'bathe' with baby wipes and not have a lot of it left on at bedtime. I have hated other bug repellants almost as much as I hate mosquitos, but I and willing, and glad, to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: B4 Serrell

customer_reviews.title: Easily half of the bottle contents had leaked out of ...
customer_reviews.text: 3 of 6 of the bottles I ordered for my trip had exploded in the box. Easily half of the bottle contents had leaked out of each defective bottles. I can’t state if the product works or not since I just received my box but it doesn’t look like I have much to actually use.
customer_reviews.author: LAC RN

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY....ZEROOOO BITES!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok,as soon as the product came I had to test it. I put very little on and asked my wife if the smell bothered her. She was quite happy with the way it smelled. She has SERIOUS senses...sight...hearing, taste etc. I can't hide from her. But then I don't want to. Anyway.... We have a very natural backyard with lots of beautiful growth, so I went in to the worst place back there which is near our blackberry grove. Always soooo many mosquitos. I was not bitten 1 time or absolutely ZERO! HOORAY for Sawyer products. I also have some of the water filtering items that work as well. A truly GREAT protector.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Flying Insects Flying
customer_reviews.text: I always buy Sawyer insect products because it works best for me. The main problem I have in my yard is biting flies. This Sawyer product seems to deter them and keep me bite free. I used to buy Sawyer Broad Spectrum, but it is hard to get now for some reason. . . but this product works well. Don't waste your money on other brands--Sawyer works!
customer_reviews.author: Backyard Images

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us mosquito magnets
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for past two summers. I walk my fur baby in a park that has dense vegetation and several area where water stands and have not been biten. I walk her 5-6 days a week and the 4 oz bottle lasts 60 days. I love that the scent is minimal. I like the lotion because it is easy to apply and sprays tend to irriate me and my baby's nose/throat.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Caused excessive skin warmth and worsened tinnitus
customer_reviews.text: This caused excessive skin warmth and it gravely worsened tinnitus. The symptoms went away after I washed it off. I suspect this is due to the liposomal formulation of this product. Regular DDT lotion doesn't cause these adverse effects.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Robot

customer_reviews.title: BEST choice for mosquito or bug repellent than an aerosol spray!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the BEST mosquito and bug repellent by far. Did last over 11 hours which was a treat and is not oily and applies like a regular skin lotion. You just need to wash your hands after applying this lotion as anything you eat tastes bitter if you do not. Survived a city where Dengue fever was prevalent. Applied it on my 3 year old daughter too every day for 4 weeks, no side effects and no problems!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this for years and haven't had ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for years and haven't had any ticks on me in areas of New England that has a high tick population
customer_reviews.author: Dominick

customer_reviews.title: The Best!!!!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I hate bug spray of all kinds. I hate the feel of it on my skin, the smell, and the fumes of it all. However, this stuff is amazing. No odor. It is a lotion so it does not feel icky. I used it once so far (last night) along Superior Lake in Northern MN. Zero bug bites, I repeat zero bug bites. I am 100% sold on this product!!
customer_reviews.author: DeLeana Strohl

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive areas like the face.
customer_reviews.text: The lotion is the way to go for certain areas like the face. If you are in a humid area like Thailand however, this may run as sweat and get in your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Colton

customer_reviews.title: Repellent is great but leaking container is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great. It needs to be shaken real well before applying. My beef is with the container the product is packaged in. Had a major leak from one of the bottles when it arrived. Very messy situation. Sawyer needs to look at a different container brand. Other people have also written about this problem.
customer_reviews.author: The Stache

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I volunteer in a warm-hot, humid marine environment and I am the "go-to person" for all biting insects. I am really protected by the Sawyers. On the 1 day I forgot to apply it, I came home with over 15 welts from insect bites.
customer_reviews.author: Lepmay

customer_reviews.title: The liquid separated
customer_reviews.text: The liquid started to separate into a clearish oil and the white globs. No longer a "lotion." No matter how much I shook the product, the two separate liquids would not mix back together into a consistent "lotion" and just the clear oilish liquid would just pour out of the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: buy something else
customer_reviews.text: my daughter just returned from Thailand and she said that she and her friends got a lot of bug bites on her legs. Three people used this entire bottle over 10 days. I thought I read that it lasts up to 12-14 hours. Bummed it didn't work better. Probable won't buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: I love this. Is a great insect repelant
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Is a great insect repelant. Has very little or no smell and it last for hours. I take it when traveling to Central America. So far.... no malaria, dengue fever, or other endemic diseased trasmites by mosquitoes after 5 years using it on these trips
customer_reviews.author: Menchu

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Oily and separated, this lotion was never actually a lotion. It was oily, separated and I was probably given an expired product. Not ideal and thrown out. No matter how long the container was shaken to mix contents, it remained the same.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is the best! Oderless
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the best! Oderless, safe for kids. We didn't get any mosquito bites when using this in the Amazon jungle. We get more mosquito bites at home in San Diego. Will start using it at home too!
customer_reviews.author: A. Wishard

customer_reviews.title: Great product, except the smell
customer_reviews.text: Pediatrician recommend this to me, my son used it during his trip. It works great, once applied, don't need to worry about Mosquitos. But the smell was horrible, and the bottle leaked, the mark on my backpack can not be washed away.
customer_reviews.author: Shadowglen Elf

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Have been using Sawyer for years. Bought 3 bottles for me and my two boys to use scout camp - very effective. Used in conjunction with permethrin treated clothes, no ticks and 1 or 2 mosquito bites the whole week (not for me, think my one son did not reapply later in the day). Great product, always buy for camping, never let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Humsley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Used this while camping in Denali National Park in Alaska. We were literally attacked by a swarm of mosquitoes when we go off the bus at our campsite. I was hard to focus on walking even. Not even a minute after using this repellent, the mosquitoes were off! They were in the vicinity but no on me. I am not entirely sure how long it's meant to last (a friend said several hours). Perhaps that's true in most cases, but the density of mosquitoes that we were facing, needed one round every 40 minutes or so. This is the first repellent I've used and am satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Anirudh

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The only bites I got in a week of the Costa Rica rainforests were on a night I didn't apply it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: NOT odorless
customer_reviews.text: This is advertised as odorless, otherwise I would not have paid the higher price. It is definitely NOT odorless. I have not tested its repellent properties. It is non-greasy. Update: I later bought a pair of the 4 oz. bottles. They were much better than what I got in the 3 oz bottles. No odor, creamier formula. I think I just got a bad batch in the 3 oz bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff! Tired of being Mosquitos Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner!
customer_reviews.text: Recommend this to every when those invisible mosquitoes were eaten us up at school and at home!!! Never knew about Deet! But someone told me to find a cream that had it and it worked!
customer_reviews.author: LisaMoon

customer_reviews.title: It works, smells lighter than most Deet products, and IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: We have these new tiger mosquitos in CA and they are vicious little sons of guns. I’ve tried just about everything and in my experience this stuff 100% the time. Only time I get bit is if I’m not wearing this. Hide your kids, your partner, hide yourself from those little monsters! Bottom line. Use this or buy a gallon of anti-itch cream!
customer_reviews.author: Geeves

customer_reviews.title: Best product and works very well.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the mosquitoes away. We travelled overseas where there are many mosquitoes and feared being bitten especially since my wife was pregnant and there were travel bans due to Zika virus and Dengue fever carried by mosquitoes. We used this product along with Deep Wood spray and both worked wonders.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I finally used this product. We spend a lot of time in the Adirondacks. I always get bit Everytime I go. I'm a mosquito magnet,no matter what spray or lotion I use, but not this time. This product exceeded my expectations. I'm gonna take this wherever I go. It says orderless, but there is a slight oder, (bug spray smell) not overwhelming at all.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Mosquitoes absolutely love me and I live in the Caribbean
customer_reviews.text: Mosquitoes absolutely love me and I live in the Caribbean. This lotion works great, they steer clear. It has a lot of deet in it, but that's the only thing that really works for me. It really is scent-less when you put it on, like the bottle says.
customer_reviews.author: Karli Walton

customer_reviews.title: This repellent really works.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find a good insect repellent. Used this on a trip to Africa and wasn't bitten the entire trip. Also used this on a fly fishing trip with lots of bugs bothering others, but this stuff really kept me protected. Not a bad smell to it either.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works exceptionally well.
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a trip to Africa. Was very pleased with the results - no bug bites for a month long safari. Have used it regularly in the swamps and our backyard here in South Carolina with the same results. Doesn't smell or seem to stain. A bit pricy but it works exceptionally well. I recommend it to anyone in bug country!
customer_reviews.author: J. Danielson

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best choice in heavily mosquito-infested areas
customer_reviews.text: Easily the very finest insect repellant that I've ever used--combining a lotion that dries without lingering scent or stickiness (and remains effective for 11 hours) with excellent effectiveness. I used it twice daily on a medical mission trip to the Dominican Republic--and it never let me down. I bought more as soon as I returned home.
customer_reviews.author: Edmund Campion

customer_reviews.title: Will only ever use this from now on!
customer_reviews.text: I work part time in Northern Uganda. This repellent is better that anything I’ve used in the past, working in tropics climates for almost ten years. I wonder what why it took me so long to discover this! The misquotes were especially heavy this year, but when I wore it, I could tell the little insects were really frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Linda St Clair

customer_reviews.title: Ok purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is not good for areas with lots of mosquitoes or for the tropics. IT felt more like a lotion than repellent.
customer_reviews.author: paul Ogando

customer_reviews.title: Effective, good price.
customer_reviews.text: I went through 2 of these on travels to SE Asia. Wore under sunscreen. Note: makes sunscreen less effective, so reapply and cover up. Found that sometimes I had to use a spray on top of this at dusk/night, especially around ankles -- but mosquitos love me.
customer_reviews.author: TaTReviews

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money. What a mess!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! Greasy. Came without a box. No expiration date. No instructions. Doesnt come out like lotion. I shook it for 5 minutes and still came out straight oil with chunks of lotions. It looks expired. I'm so unhappy with the product. If you're going to buy this brand I'd say go with the spray. Also it is NOT odorless.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: This stuff smells absolutely terrible and makes me feel sick just catching a whiff
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells absolutely terrible and makes me feel sick just catching a whiff. But it is super effective. The lotion, rather than spray, is nice for travelling.
customer_reviews.author: R.LienTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not delivered nicely
customer_reviews.text: When it was delivered, the content was spilled inside the bag. It was all sticky and because it was spilled almost a third of the content was already gone.
customer_reviews.author: hyemma

customer_reviews.title: Bugs stayed away
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Great for use under sunscreen. Easy to apply. Kept mosquitos away! Used for trip to Belize. Score: 10/10 Ease of use: 10/10 Does what product says: 10/10 Remember to reapply after swimming. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shira

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Over the last several months, each week when I do yard work I would get bitten by something. I never knew what it was, but it it would take days to heal, and often require a doctor's visit. I read about this Insect Repellent Lotion - I didn't want a spray. It has been amazing! No bites over the last four weeks. I don't apply it like suntan lotion, just a very light coating before I head out. It has made working outside much more enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: SOP Man

customer_reviews.title: Creamy
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect it to be a lotion even thought it is in the name of the product. They just put the word lotion at the end of the title to see if anyone would catch it. I thought it was a spray when ordering it. Not a fan but it might work. It's anyone's guess
customer_reviews.author: Steven Rysted

customer_reviews.title: It didn’t work well for me. I got 20+ ...
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t work well for me. I got 20+ mosquito bites during my 3 day trip to Mexico. I was diligent about putting this lotion on, knowing that I usually get bit by mosquitoes when I travel to tropical places. I wouldn’t buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Odorless, stainless and creamy
customer_reviews.text: Sawyer's has been my favorite for about 5 years. I've used other brands and have found them too greasy or sticky, both on initial application and after a few miles of hiking on a hot day. There is no smell from Sawyer's unlike the brands that make you smell like a citronella candle. Lastly, the creamy lotion does not discolor or stain clothing or plastic like some brands do.
customer_reviews.author: Newport Hiker

customer_reviews.title: It really doesn't smell!
customer_reviews.text: Effective at keeping mosquitos, ticks, and other nasties away. Although you can smell the DEET when you put it on, the smell really does go away after it dries. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Bayside Father

customer_reviews.title: Bye bye Mosquitoes !!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very effective. It requires a small amount to keep the bugs offf so the value for you dollar is great. Additionally, the smell is not overwhelming as in many like products. I put in on the table in my yard when I have guest so we can all have a bug free day!
customer_reviews.author: deborah zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Disease protection
customer_reviews.text: Used it last year on a mission trip to Dominican Republic, no bites. Mission work in Zambia during the rainy season coming up. Want to avoid malaria and the multitude of viral illnesses prevalent there. convenient size and shape.
customer_reviews.author: A. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Saved our lives in Belize!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this and the Sawyer pump insect repellent spray for a vacation to Belize. We expected the ‘no see ‘ums’, sand fleas, flies, mosquitoes, and they were all plentiful! The lotion is fantastic. I coated all exposed skin and was totally protected. It is long lasting. I did reapply after swimming/snorkeling.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Egan

customer_reviews.title: It is worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly great product. It works! I am truly glad I gave it a try. Definitely worth the money even as pricey as it is. Making this part of my travel kit 100%
customer_reviews.author: Yvetsy

customer_reviews.title: Great Value For The Money!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very worthy product for a fair price. This product works just as described. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Reynold Y Fareau

customer_reviews.title: No scent - No grease After Application
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. A couple minutes after application, this stuff is dry with no smell and no grease. If I didn't have to be so worried about mosquitoes where I was in the world, it would have been easy to forget I even had this on. I never had a mosquito near me while I was wearing this. This will be a fixture in my camping and adventuring gear. I am extremely pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: No Bites
customer_reviews.text: This stuff goes a long way. Used for our trip to Thailand. My husband is 6' 5" so that is a lot of body to cover. No bites in site. Applied it to hands, legs and torso with sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel E. Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! Packaging was neat, and as expected. Went hiking near a river, and the bugs stayed far away! I placed this on my neck, ears, and face, and it worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't stink with a fake aroma that covers the aromas of nature. The lotion feels good and because it isn't a spray doesn't go all over the place. I literally stood by a swamp to see how it well it works. The bugs stayed about a foot away all around me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Friends who used Off or skin so soft were not as fortunate. This is strong stuff
customer_reviews.text: Used this in Jamaica where Zika and Chick V is rampant. Did not get any bites and I was there for almost a month. Friends who used Off or skin so soft were not as fortunate. This is strong stuff, but needed in the Caribbean and other places where Zika, Chick V or malaria is prevalent.
customer_reviews.author: Gavelgirl

customer_reviews.title: Hunted hard during November and never got one tick on ...
customer_reviews.text: Hunted hard during November and never got one tick on me while other hunters in my group got covered with ticks while hunting in the same general area.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry H.

customer_reviews.title: No bites and no rash
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way! Applied this for a hike and no bites. I have very sensitive skin and I did not break out.
customer_reviews.author: Andia

customer_reviews.title: A useful product.
customer_reviews.text: If you are going to be in an area known to have mosquitoes, this is the product for your clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Tom C

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Use this all the time. Eliminates spray and is not sticky at all plus it's works very well. Just got back from Africa with malaria rampant and no bites.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Works well, no mess
customer_reviews.text: I like the lotion much better than aerosol spray, makes applying inside possible. I put it on in the bathroom and then wash my hands - no going outside to spray and then coming back in to wash up.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Stuff works great
customer_reviews.text: While this has deet, I only use it for extreme situations and it works great and lasts a long time
customer_reviews.author: Red Dog

customer_reviews.title: Amazon jungle proven
customer_reviews.text: During a recent 2-week trip the Amazon Rainforest, we were virtually bite-free. Worked great with low odor and a non-oily feel.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: A GODSEND
customer_reviews.text: Mosquitoes avoid me like hellfire with this, and I'm a mosquito magnet! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells bad and doesn't work at all. Wouldn't recommend it to anyone. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Reverend James.C.Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: This is the best skeeter repellent I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the best skeeter repellent I've ever used. Just a bit on the neck and ankles is all I need. My wife is very susceptible to mosquito bites, but when she's wearing this, they leave her alone. Wish they made a travel size because the TSA confiscated my last bottle coming back from a trip. Overall very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Mikeyk

customer_reviews.title: Good if you need heavy protection
customer_reviews.text: For a hot climate where you'll be sweating and where you need good mosquito protection for malaria or other disease purposes the lotion is a good choice. Info says it decreases the effectiveness of sun screen so keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: JStar

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works really good, haven’t had a bite since I’ve been using it. The scent is almost not noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: C. Klemetsen

customer_reviews.title: the telephoto does not adjust it is fixed at three feet.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work. the telephoto lens is frozen and focused at 3 feet. Please let me return it for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: El Flaco

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works really well - I was first introduced ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works really well - I was first introduced to it in northern Wisconsin rivers teeming with mosquitos. I am normally eaten alive even when covered with regular OFF or other insecticides. This one made a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: female

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for and allergic insect magnet!
customer_reviews.text: Great protection!! I live in a woods and it works at well as stinky greasy deep woods sprays! I really like it for my grandkids, no oily mess on furniture and cushions!! I am an insect magnet and very allergic---this stuff is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Actually works
customer_reviews.text: This thing really works. Keeps the mosquitoes away. No bites when using this
customer_reviews.author: nbawtf

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the skeeters away like nothing else can
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the skeeters away like nothing else can. Burns like the devil if you get it too close to your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: powerfulkev

customer_reviews.title: Good but not exceptional
customer_reviews.text: Despite following the instruction perfectly, it was not effective against some mosquitos, therefore I would recommend it only in conjunction with long sleeves and pants.
customer_reviews.author: TaniaI

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I like using this versus a spray. Feels better on my body and definitely keeps the bugs off.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Works but isn’t perfect
customer_reviews.text: It kind of worked. I still got some bug bites but it wasn’t as many as the last time I went to a tropical island without any insect lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Maria V

customer_reviews.title: Smell still bothered me but it served its purpose
customer_reviews.text: The smell of this was better than I've experienced, but still bugged me. As a result I didn't use as often as I would have if it smelled better. Still I think it's impossible for it to be truly effective and pleasant smelling. Seems to work well though.
customer_reviews.author: Edagirl

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have if You're Going Anywhere Near Mosquitos or Bugs of Any kind!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product. My husband and I went to hang our tree stands for hunting, but we forgot to use this. When we got into the woods, the mosquitos were all over us, ugh!! I went back real quick to grab this, and after applying it, the mosquitos were no longer interested in us. We could see them, but they didn't bite us. What a SUPER product!!
customer_reviews.author: shihtzumom

customer_reviews.title: I coupled this with Permethrine in order to protect against ...
customer_reviews.text: I coupled this with Permethrine in order to protect against ticks and bugs. It was 100% effective over a 4 hour hike. I couldn't even get ants to crawl over my hands. The quantity is a bit small, so if you are going to use this on a daily basis, try to find a way to make a bulk order.
customer_reviews.author: cypher

customer_reviews.title: It's fun to watch all the critters bounce off
customer_reviews.text: I use it daily in the mountainous sections of NH and Maine, about 5-6 days/week, 24 hrs/day, 60 days/year. It's fun to watch all the critters bump into me and seemingly keel over backwards. I skipped it just once and got several bites that day and spent the night scratching. Now I know how valuable it is and would never leave home without it. Nothing else I've tried was nearly as effective.
customer_reviews.author: Buttons

customer_reviews.title: Works for sure, 100% effective
customer_reviews.text: I took it on vacation to St. Marten. We stayed near the water and did not get a bite for 6 days, then I forgot to apply on our last day and they got me. You need to get this 30% for the tropics, or you are toast.
customer_reviews.author: Mars Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Keep the Bugs Away
customer_reviews.text: Works just as good as the competition!! Keeps the bugs off!
customer_reviews.author: Blaine Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Works great against mosquitoes
customer_reviews.text: Works great against mosquitoes. I like that it wasn’t super oily and didn’t have a strong smell like other deet products. I bought it for a trip to the Philippines.
customer_reviews.author: ToriLBC

customer_reviews.title: Must have it when you go to the park/mountain
customer_reviews.text: I thought I bought a spray type... I bought the bottle type for mistake. It still works, I put it on my legs and arms and it protects from mosquitoes.
customer_reviews.author: Blueberry pancakes 🥞

customer_reviews.title: Product worked
customer_reviews.text: Worked well in the mosquito filled area I was in.
customer_reviews.author: todd S

customer_reviews.title: Works but not odorless
customer_reviews.text: The product works for keeping insects off but it was advertised as odorless, which it is not. Had it been odorless, I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: anonymity lover

customer_reviews.title: Great for mission trips
customer_reviews.text: I've used this on mission trips to Cambodia, Kenya, and Haiti. Hardly ever got bit while wearing but days I forgot I got eaten up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really works. Recommend for everyone to buy
customer_reviews.text: I went to El Salvador this past March and the country is Zika infected at the moment. I only went for 3 days and let me tell you during those three days not one mosquito got near me.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Fl.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Not a bite not a bug while in the hill country of Thailand and in southern India.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: worked great for us between 2 people in the Peru hiking ...
customer_reviews.text: worked great for us between 2 people in the Peru hiking trip. A little goes a long way and we still have plenty left in bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren S

product_meta.title: Sawyer Products Ultra 30% DEET Insect Repellent Lotion
product_meta.description:
The non-greasy, odorless Ultra 30 Insect Repellent Lotion from Sawyer combines 30 percent DEET with a comfortable liposome base for up to 11 hours of protection against mosquitoes, ticks, flies, chiggers, fleas, and no-see-ums. It's comfortable for use in the backcountry or in the backyard.

Similar to the earlier generation of polymer-based controlled release systems, the Liposome envelops the active ingredient, DEET, and slowly time-releases it as needed, thereby extending the effectiveness of the repellent. Unlike polymers, however, liposomes are a natural compound more often used in cosmetics, which allows this formula to be comfortable to the skin, easier to wear, and practically odorless. Sawyer Ultra 30 is also non-staining, compatible with sunscreens, and sweat proof. It's available in an airline-friendly 3-ounce bottle, as well as a 4-ounce bottle.

Since 1984, Sawyer Products has offered the best, most technologically advanced solutions for protection against sun, bugs, water, and injuries -- everything from first aid kits developed for wilderness to point-of-use water filters that filter contaminated water to levels cleaner than U.S. bottled water.
feature_bullets: Liposome-based repellent with 30 percent DEET -- great for use in the backcountry or backyard
Effective against mosquitoes, ticks, flies, chiggers, fleas, and no-see-ums
Controlled release formula provides lasting protection for up to 11 hours
